title.narrative: Capacity building project for the promotion of integrity, transparency and accountability, and community monitoring of development projects

description.narrative:
Overall Objective:
Ensure transparency and integrity in the management of community projects, especially by inclusion of women in the monitoring
Specific objectives:
- Revitalize old barazas, - Promote and strengthen the active participation of local people in project monitoring, - Give more powers to local communities through various training so they are more equipped to get involved in the monitoring of community projects, - Advocate for more community participation in different project phases: design, implementation and evaluation of community projects, - Monitor the implementation of projects to the satisfaction of donors, implementers and communities; - Advocate for promoting community access to information and efficient implementation of community projects.;
